hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "This job will take jenkins backup" rm -rf /tmp/gitrepo mkdir /tmp/gitrepo GITDIR="/tmp/gitrepo"
cd $GITDIR rm -rf * echo "Cloning the repository" git --version
git clone git@github.com:yogeshbha/hello-world.git
cd hello-world
now=`date +"%H_%M_%m_%d_%Y"` mkdir backup.$now cd backup.$now cp -r /var/lib/jenkins/* .
sleep 5 rm *.log
cd .. git add -A
git commit -m "Pushing the backup uo file to Repository $date" git push
